name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Graphics Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications optimized for real-time rendering and cross-platform compatibility. Proficient in **C++**, **Vulkan**, **Metal**, and **Unity**, with a strong focus on GPU performance and optimization strategies. Expertise in debugging and profiling to enhance rendering efficiency and reduce compute load using advanced techniques such as LOD, anti-aliasing, and illumination strategies.

Demonstrated ability in building complex systems, with hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for frontend and backend development. Adept at implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines, leveraging cloud services on **AWS** and **Azure**. Engaged in compliance-driven development tailored to meet industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Solid grounding in AI/ML-powered solutions incorporating predictive analytics and real-time processes.
